sentences.en: A tragic view of life is thus an uneliminable ingredient in atheistic thought.
sentences.cn: 于是,生命的悲剧意识是无神论思想无法消除的要素.

sentences.en: Acetic acid is the chief active ingredient in vinegar.
sentences.cn: 醋酸是醋的主要有效成分。

sentences.en: Coconut is a basic ingredient for many curries.
sentences.cn: 椰子是多种咖喱菜的基本成分。

sentences.en: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.cn: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.en: Dioxin was the ingredient in Agent Orange, used to defoliate Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 越南战场上用于毁灭林区的“橙剂”，其成分是二氧杂芑。

sentences.en: In all the formulas for mold spray, a common ingredient is water.
sentences.cn: 在给出的所有脱模剂配方中, 水是共用的拼料.

sentences.en: Individualism has been the secret ingredient in developing his chain of fashion stores.
sentences.cn: 讲求个性化是他发展时装连锁店的一大秘诀.

sentences.en: Language is an essential ingredient of abstract thought.
sentences.cn: 语言是抽象思维的主要成分之一.

sentences.en: Molasses is not an easy ingredient to mix into concentrated feeds.
sentences.cn: 糖蜜作为一种饲料成分与精料混合并不容易.

sentences.en: Salt is a crucial ingredient in cooking.
sentences.cn: 盐是烹调的一种重要材料.

sentences.en: Speed is the essential ingredient of all athletics.
sentences.cn: 速度是所有田径运动项目的关键要素。

sentences.en: The active ingredient in some of the mouthwashes was simply detergent.
sentences.cn: 某些漱口剂中的有效成分只不过是洗涤剂而已。

sentences.en: The Australian team had the added ingredient of perseverance.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队另外还具备了顽强的意志.

sentences.en: The basic ingredient of the mixture is liquid thiokol.
sentences.cn: 其基本组份之一是液体聚硫橡胶.

sentences.en: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.cn: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

sentences.en: This concept of job rotation lacks the basic ingredient of practical experience.
sentences.cn: 这种工作轮调方式缺少实践的重要部分.

sentences.en: This ingredient does not invite or generally produce lugubrious lamentation.
sentences.cn: 这一要素并不引起,或者说通常不产生故作悲伤的叹息.

sentences.en: Vulgarity is a very important ingredient in life.
sentences.cn: 庸俗是生活中非常必要的作料.

trans.tran_cn: （混合物的）组成部分，（烹调的）原料，（构成）要素，因素
trans.tran_en: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish
